greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lucas(n) mod n, Lucas(n)= A000032(n).
comment: a(n) = 1 for all prime values of n. Composite values for which a(n) = 1 are listed in A005845.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: with(combinat):f:=n-> fibonacci(n):L:=n->f(2*n)/f(n): seq(L(n) mod n, n= 1..75)
results.author: _Gary Detlefs_, Jun 03 2012
